Posts.Content: On Sep 08, 2010 4:28 PM Oncrx wrote: I went back and read your original post and had a question.  In the last PET (last year) was there uptake in that level II LN?  This report says the size and morphology are the same and uptake this time but I cant tell if there was uptake in that LN last time.  If there was no uptake last time, but now there is,  then that could be a sign of metastatic activity.  See what your oncologist/radiologist thinks. No there was no uptake last time
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN

Posts.Content: My oncologist think it is OK - She  will do a physical check up after a month - and review again. Is there anything I need to do to be absolutely sure if it it is not metastisis.
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN

Posts.Content: Also the uptake in LN is seen in neck region
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN

Posts.Content: What does an uptake mean - If the morphology and size has not changed - What could be the reason behind the uptake in the LN - Can I do anything to make sure it is completely safe - Or how can I ascertain the reason of uptake ?
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN

Posts.Content: My Mother was diagnosed for Breast Cancer on Nov 2005 and Was given a final Chemo on May 2006. All her yearly PET SCans have been Normal since.  The current PET report mentions teh following: 8.0 mCi of 18F-Fdg was USED for PET/CT Scan. SUV were Calculated based on Body Weight. Comparisn with previous report showed following:  -A small left level II lymph node (In the neck) is detected which is unchanged in size and morphology since the previous study, but shows uptake of FGD (SUVmax:6.7). Sclerotic Lesions are seen in D6 and L3 vertebral bodies which shows no metabolic activity and are unchanged. What does this mean ? Should I be worried ? What steps do I need to take?
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN

Posts.Content: Last PET was done a year back. Is another PET advisable in a months time - In that case I will get it done after a months time. If it shows up again  - Should we go for a biopsy of the LN ?
Posts.Title: FDG Uptake Explanation - PET SCAN
